text: Brooks Thompson (born June 13, 2002) is an American professional soccer player who plays for Sporting Kansas City II in the USL Championship. ==Career== Thompson spent two years with the IMG Academy, as well as appearing for USL PDL side Derby City Rovers and the Sporting Kansas City academy, before signing a professional contract with Sporting's USL Championship side Swope Park Rangers on March 7, 2019. He made his professional debut on July 17, 2019, starting in a 4–3 win over Hartford Athletic. In Thompson's fourth appearance, he was named to the USL Championship Week 6 Team of the Week after recording his first ever shutout in a 1-0 win over the Indy Eleven on August 1, 2020. ==References== == External links == * Sporting KC profile * Category:2002 births Category:American soccer players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Derby City Rovers players Category:Living people Category:People from Floyd County, Indiana Category:Soccer players from Indiana Category:Sporting Kansas City II players Category:USL Championship players Category:USL League Two players
title: Brooks Thompson (soccer)
